mapper.select: SELECT L.* , U.name staff_user_name , cust.name customerName , cust.customer_code , (Select name from user_info Where user_no = L.duty_staff_no) as duty_user_name , (Select name from user_info Where user_no = L.approve_user_no) as approve_user_name , (Select name from user_info Where user_no = L.reg_user_no) as regUserName , (Select name from user_info Where user_no = L.finish_user_no) as finishUserName , (Select province_name from province Where province_no = cust.province_no) as province_name , IFNULL((select COUNT(loan_no) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and status = 'P' and confirm_date IS NOT NULL), 0) as alreadyPaidSession , (select IFNULL(SUM(amount), 0) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and status = 'P' and confirm_date IS NOT NULL) as paid , (select SUM(capital) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and confirm_date IS NULL ) as currentDebt , IFNULL((select SUM(profit) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and (status != 'P') ),0) as remainProfit , IFNULL((select COUNT(loan_no) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and status != 'P' and end_date <= DATE(#{currentDate}) and L.status != 'F'), 0) as delay_days , (select IFNULL(SUM(amount), 0) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and status != 'P' and end_date <= DATE(#{currentDate}) and L.status != 'F') as delay_amount , (select SUM(amount) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no) as totalPaidAmount FROM loan L LEFT OUTER JOIN customer cust ON cust.customer_no = L.customer_no LEFT OUTER JOIN user_info U ON U.user_no = L.staff_user_no WHERE L.loan_no = #{loaNo} AND (L.delete_yn = 0)

SELECT COUNT(L.loan_no) FROM ( SELECT L.* , cust.name customerName , cust.town_no town_no , cust.customer_code , IFNULL((select COUNT(loan_no) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and status = 'P' and confirm_date IS NOT NULL), 0) as alreadyPaidSession , (select COUNT(loan_no) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no) as totalSession , (Select name from user_info Where user_no = L.duty_staff_no) as duty_user_name , IFNULL((select COUNT(loan_no) from loan_detail where loan_no = L.loan_no and status = 'D' and L.status != 'F'), 0) as delay_days FROM loan L LEFT OUTER JOIN customer cust ON cust.customer_no = L.customer_no LEFT OUTER JOIN user_info U ON U.user_no = L.staff_user_no ) L
